input: Which of the following statements about Indian Judiciary is not correct ?

options.A: The Constitution of India has not provided for double system of courts as in the United States
options.B: The organization of the subordinate judiciary in India varies slightly from State to State
options.C: Every State in India has separate High Court
options.D: The Supreme Court has issued direction to constitute an All India Judicial Service to bring about uniformity in designation of officers in criminal and civil side
